price: To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and earth, and to Allah will return all matters.
arabic: لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
